column1: request_grant_desc;Request a grant from other players.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
enable_options_desc;Enables the option menu which includes options for grants

disable_political_thought_desc;Disables the decisions that give modifiers based upon level of political thought researched in the nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
